name: Verena Kantere
content: Home | Faculty of Engineering Faculty of Engineering Engineering education through generations Why uOttawa Engineering? Because you want to make a difference in the world, you love to create, and you think globally. close play_arrow Faculty of Engineering Make your ideas a reality Learning for everyone at every age Undergraduate studies Graduate studies Professional development Kids and teens Community Studying engineering at uOttawa Undergraduate programs Academic Office Courses with industry Studying engineering at uOttawa Graduate programs Online graduate programs Find a thesis supervisor Online programs Microprograms Engineering Sales School Faculty of Engineering Secondary School Programs for kids and teens Community days at the Richard L'Abbé Makerspace Maker Mobile Workshop Simon Nehme Summer Entrepreneurship School 7,000+ students 25,000+ alumni 85+ programs and options Faculty news Research How uOttawa engineering researchers helped deliver the moon to MDA Space Mock lunar landscape and other tools developed to test sensors and prototypes to guide future lunar rovers, demonstrating the value of uOttawa-industry R&D collaboration Recent stories More news keyboard_arrow_right Research Thirteen uOttawa researchers named among the world’s most influential Gazette Ingenuity through collaboration: Students design a smart system for remote-controlled cars Faculty of Engineering uOttawa Engineering ups investment in computer science Faculty of Engineering uOttawa and GM researchers collaborate to advance automotive safety with generative AI Research with impact Research has always been one of the core strengths of the University of Ottawa. The Faculty of Engineering has embraced this mindset and has become one of the strongest places in Canada in which to conduct research in engineering. Discover our areas of research Recent Research news More research news How uOttawa engineering researchers helped deliver the moon to MDA Space uOttawa and GM researchers collaborate to advance automotive safety with generative AI Evolving rivers: Rethinking conservation in a changing climate More research news keyboard_arrow_left Entrepreneurship and design The Faculty of Engineering cultivates creativity and nurtures an innovative mindset among students. The Centre for Entrepreneurship and Engineering Design (CEED) was founded on the belief that knowledge alone is insufficient. Every step of the way, we'll provide you with engineering design and entrepreneurship skills, empowering you to create groundbreaking solutions to modern challenges. Discover CEED Student hub With 24 clubs and teams, state-of-the-art facilities and design spaces, and over 25 events each year, the life of a student at the Faculty of Engineering is anything but dull.
